subtitles.xx: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(0,0)\\Two days ago//(0,1)\\Hiya Stone. What've you got for us?//[STONE_MP]\\//(0,1)\\Package retrieval mission, Knight. Han Ldong, former Khandanyang national poet, has been kidnapped from his suburban home in Vermont. We're going to get him back.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(0,1)\\Ldong... That's the guy who jumped ship to the US during a United Nations meeting a few years ago, right? Who are we hitting?//[STONE_MP]\\//(0,1)\\Our targets are JIN NOO, LHOM KWAI and RE THAK, three ranking members of Sun Po’s military elite known as the Heavenly Guard. The trio's in Singapore to grab Mr. and Mrs. Ldong from a shipping container smuggled in from the US.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(0,1)\\If they're sent back, Sun Po will have them executed in some bizarre public ritual.//[STONE_MP]\\//(0,1)\\Yeah. The three targets are just about ready to transfer Ldong and his wife to a cargo ship here. They're on high alert and if the alarm goes off, we should expect one or more of the targets to try to kill the hostages. That cannot happen.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(0,7)\\Ten-four. Let's save us a poet.
subtitles.en: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(46.5,48.5)\\Hiya, Stone. What've you got for us?//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,50.9)\\- Package retrieval mission, Knight.//(50.9,56.8)\\Han Ldong, former Khandanyang national poet, has been kidnapped from his suburban home in Vermont.//(56.8,58.65)\\We're going to get him back.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\- Ldong... That's the guy who jumped ship to the US during a United Nations meeting a few years ago, right?//(63.7,65)\\Who are we hitting?//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\- Our targets are Jin Noo, Lhom Kwai and Re Thak,//(70.2,75.2)\\three ranking members of Sun Po’s military elite known as the Heavenly Guard.//(75.2,81.2)\\The trio's in Singapore to grab Mr. and Mrs. Ldong from a shipping container smuggled in from the US.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\- If they're sent back, Sun Po will have them executed in some bizarre public ritual.//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\- Yeah. The three targets are just about ready to transfer Ldong and his wife to a cargo ship here.//(91.8,98.1)\\They're on high alert and if the alarm goes off, we should expect one or more of the targets to try to kill the hostages.//(98.1,99.9)\\That cannot happen.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.5)\\- Ten-four. Let's save us a poet.
subtitles.fr: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(2.5,5.3)\\DEUX JOURS AUPARAVANT//(46.5,48.5)\\Salut, Stone. Bon, qu'est-ce qu'on a ?//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,50.9)\\- Mission de récupération de colis, Knight.//(50.9,56.8)\\Han Ldong, ancien poète de Khandanyang, kidnappé chez lui dans le Vermont.//(56.8,58.65)\\On part le récupérer.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\- Ldong... C'est le mec qui a quitté le navire pour rejoindre les États-Unis pendant un sommet des Nations Unies il y a quelques années, c'est ça ?//(63.7,65)\\Et on le protège de qui, alors ?//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\- Nos cibles sont Jin Noo, Lhom Kwai et Re Thak,//(70.2,75.2)\\trois membres des forces d'élite de la garde militaire de Sun Po, la Garde céleste.//(75.2,81.2)\\Le trio est en ce moment à Singapour pour attraper Ldong et sa femme, qui immigrent des États-Unis dans un porte-conteneurs.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\- S'ils sont renvoyés, Sun Po les exécutera pendant une cérémonie publique bizarre...//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\- Ouais. Les trois cibles vont transférer Ldong et sa femme dans un cargo.//(91.8,98.1)\\Ils sont en état d'alerte maximal, et si l'alarme se déclenche, on peut s'attendre à ce que l'une des cibles tente d'abattre les otages.//(98.1,99.9)\\On ne peut pas vraiment se le permettre.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.5)\\- Cinq-sur-cinq. Allons sauver ce poète, alors.
subtitles.it: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(2.5,5.3)\\DUE GIORNI PRIMA//(46.5,48.5)\\Ehilà, Stone. Cos'hai per noi?//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,50.9)\\- Missione recupero pacco, Knight.//(50.9,56.8)\\Han Ldong, ex poeta nazionale di Khandanyang è stato rapito dalla sua casa di periferia nel Vermont.//(56.8,58.65)\\Noi lo riporteremo indietro.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\- Ldong... è quel tizio che è saltato sulla nave per gli Stati Uniti durante il vertice delle Nazioni Unite qualche anno fa, giusto?//(63.7,65)\\A chi diamo la caccia?//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\- I nostri bersagli sono Jin Noo, Lhom Kwai e Re Thak,//(70.2,75.2)\\tre membri di spicco dell'élite militare di Sun Po, nota col nome di Guardia celestiale.//(75.2,81.2)\\Il trio si trova a Singapore per recuperare il signore e la signora Ldong da un container illegale proveniente dagli Stati Uniti.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\- Se dovessero riuscire a riportarli indietro, Sun Po li giustizierà in una sorta di cerimonia pubblica.//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\- Sì. I tre bersagli sono pronti a trasferire Ldong e sua moglie su una nave da carico che si trova qui.//(91.8,98.1)\\Sono in allerta e se dovessero avere qualche sospetto, almeno uno di loro cercherà sicuramente di eliminare gli ostaggi.//(98.1,99.9)\\Questo non deve succedere.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.5)\\- Ricevuto. Salviamo questo poeta.
subtitles.de: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(2.5,5.3)\\VOR ZWEI TAGEN//(46.5,48.5)\\Tag auch, Stone. Was haben Sie für uns?//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,50.9)\\- Wir haben ein Paket abzuliefern, Knight.//(50.9,56.8)\\Han Ldong, ehemaliger Nationaldichter von Khandanyang, wurde aus seinem Haus in einem Vorort von Vermont entführt.//(56.8,58.65)\\Wir werden ihn zurückholen.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\- Ldong ... Das ist doch der Kerl, der während einer Versammlung der Vereinten Nationen vor ein paar Jahren zu den USA übergelaufen ist, oder?//(63.7,65)\\Wen legen wir denn um?//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\- Unsere Ziele sind Jin Noo, Lhom Kwai und Re Thak://(70.2,75.2)\\drei hochrangige Mitglieder der Himmlischen Garde, Sun Pos Elitemilitär.//(75.2,81.2)\\Das Trio ist in Singapur, um Mr. und Mrs.  Ldong aus einem Transportcontainer zu holen, mit dem sie aus den USA herausgeschmuggelt wurden.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\- Wenn sie zurückgeschickt werden, wird Sun Po sie in einem bizarren öffentlichen Ritual hinrichten lassen.//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\- Ja. Die drei Ziele sind so gut wie bereit, Ldong und seine Frau auf ein Frachtschiff hier zu bringen.//(91.8,98.1)\\Sie sind in hoher Alarmbereitschaft, und wenn der Alarm ausgelöst wird, werden vermutlich ein oder mehrere der Ziele versuchen, die Geiseln zu töten.//(98.1,99.9)\\Das darf nicht passieren.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.6)\\- Verstanden. Retten wir einen Dichter.
subtitles.es: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(2.5,5.3)\\HACE DOS DÍAS//(46.5,48.5)\\Hola, Stone. ¿Qué nos traes?//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,50.9)\\- Una misión de recuperación de un paquete, Knight.//(50.9,56.8)\\Han Ldong, antiguo poeta nacional de Khandanyang, ha sido secuestrado en su casa del centro de Vermont.//(56.8,58.65)\\Vamos a recuperarlo.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\- Ldong... Ese es el tipo que, hace unos años, cambió de bando y se fue con los Estados Unidos durante una reunión de las Naciones Unidas, ¿no?//(63.7,65)\\¿A quién hay que cargarse?//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\- Nuestros objetivos son Jin Noo, Lhom Kwai y Re Thak,//(70.2,75.2)\\tres miembros clave de la élite militar de Sun Po. Se les conoce como la Guardia Celestial//(75.2,81.2)\\y están los tres en Singapur, donde prevén recoger al señor y a la señora Ldong en el contenedor que los trajo desde Estados Unidos.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\- Si lo consiguen, Sun Po los ejecutará en un extraño ritual público.//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\- Sí. Los tres objetivos están preparados para transferir a Ldong y a su esposa a un barco de carga.//(91.8,98.1)\\Están en alerta máxima y, como salte cualquier alarma, lo más probable es que alguno de los objetivos, si no todos, intente matar a los rehenes.//(98.1,99.9)\\No lo podemos permitir.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.6)\\- Entendido. Salvemos a un poeta.
subtitles.ru: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(2.5,5.3)\\ДВУМЯ ДНЯМИ РАНЕЕ//(46.5,48.5)\\Привет, Стоун. Что там у тебя?//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,50.9)\\- Нужно переправить одну посылочку, Найт.//(50.9,56.8)\\Хан Лдонг, бывший национальный поэт Ханданьянга, похищен из своего загородного дома в Вермонте.//(56.8,58.65)\\Мы должны спасти его.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\- Лдонг... Это тот, кто пару лет назад сбежал в Штаты во время конференции ООН, верно?//(63.7,65)\\И кого нам нужно устранить?//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\- Наши цели — Джин Ну, Лхом Квай и Ре Так.//(70.2,75.2)\\Они — важные шишки в «Небесной гвардии», элитной армии Сунь По.//(75.2,81.2)\\Сейчас все трое находятся в Сингапуре и ждут морской контейнер, в котором мистера и миссис Лдонг вывезли из США.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\- Если их отправят обратно в Ханданьянг, Сунь По устроит настоящее шоу из их казни.//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\- Итак, наши цели уже почти готовы переправить Лдонга с супругой на грузовой корабль.//(91.8,98.1)\\Они на взводе, так что, если поднимется тревога, кто-то из них может убить заложников.//(98.1,99.9)\\Этого нельзя допустить.//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.6)\\- Принято. Надо спасать поэта.
subtitles.cn: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(2.5,5.3)\\两天前//(46.5,48.5)\\你好啊，斯通。这次是什么任务？//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,50.9)\\-奈特，人质救援任务。//(50.9,56.8)\\肯达尼昂前民族诗人董涵在佛蒙特州一处郊区的家中被人绑架了。//(56.8,58.65)\\我们得把他救回来。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\-董......就是几年前在联合国会议上投奔美国的那个家伙对吧？//(63.7,65)\\我们要杀的是谁？//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\-我们的目标是诺金、葵洛和萨丽，//(70.2,75.2)\\此三人是薄隼的精英军事团体“神圣护卫”的核心成员。//(75.2,81.2)\\此三人正在新加坡等着押送用集装箱偷运出美国的董氏夫妇。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\-如果他们被送回去，薄隼就会在一场离奇的公开仪式上将他们处决。//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\-嗯。三名目标即将准备把董氏夫妇转移到这里的货船上。//(91.8,98.1)\\他们处于高度戒备状态，如果警报响起，应该会有至少一名目标试图杀死人质。//(98.1,99.9)\\决不能发生那种事。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.6)\\-明白。我们去当这位诗人的大救星吧。
subtitles.tc: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(2.5,5.3)\\兩天前//(46.5,48.5)\\你好啊，斯通。你給我們帶來了些什麼東西？//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,48.5)\\-包裹取回任務，奈特。//(48.5,55.5)\\董韓，前任坎丹楊國家級詩人在佛蒙特州郊外的家中被綁架了。//(56.8,58.65)\\我們得去救回他。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\-董......那傢伙不是在幾年前的聯合國會議中投靠美國嗎？//(63.7,65)\\我們的目標是誰？//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\-我們的目標是樓金、桂龍和卓雷，//(70.2,75.2)\\這三人是波孫菁英軍式組織—— 天衛的高階成員。//(75.2,81.2)\\這個三人組正在新加坡等待用來將董氏夫婦從美國私運出來的貨櫃。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\-要是他們被送回去，波孫會以誇張的公共儀式處決他們。//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\-是啊，這三個目標正準備在這裡將董氏夫婦轉運至貨船上。//(91.8,98.1)\\他們戒備森嚴，而且要是警報響起，應該會有不止一個目標嘗試殺死人質。//(98.1,99.9)\\我們不能放任這種事發生。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.6)\\-收到了，我們去救出這名詩人吧。
subtitles.jp: //[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(2.5,5.3)\\2日前//(46.5,48.5)\\やあ、ストーン。それで仕事の内容は？//[STONE_MP]\\//(48.5,50.9)\\誘拐された要人の奪還任務だ、ナイト。//(50.9,56.8)\\ハンダンヤンの元国民的詩人ハン・ルドンがバーモント州の郊外の自宅から誘拐された。//(56.8,58.65)\\連れ戻さないといけない。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(58.65,63.7)\\ルドン... たしか数年前に国連会議の最中にアメリカに鞍替えした人でしょ？//(63.7,65)\\私たちは誰を襲撃するの？//[STONE_MP]\\//(65,70.2)\\俺たちのターゲットは、ジン・ヌー、ロン・カイ、レ・タク。//(70.2,75.2)\\スン・ポーの「天の警護」という軍事エリート集団の主要メンバーだ。//(75.2,81.2)\\3人は今、アメリカからコンテナでこっそり運ばれてきたルドン夫妻を受け取るためにシンガポールにいる。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(81.2,85.7)\\夫妻が国に連れ戻されたら、スン・ポーの気色悪い儀式の生贄として公開処刑されるってわけね。//[STONE_MP]\\//(85.7,91.8)\\そうだ。3人はちょうど、ルドン夫妻をここで貨物船に乗せる準備を終えるところだ。//(91.8,98.1)\\警戒は厳重で、危険を察知すれば奴らの誰かが夫妻を殺害するだろう。//(98.1,99.9)\\それだけは避けなきゃならない。//[KNIGHT_MP]\\//(99.9,103.6)\\了解。じゃあ詩人救助と行きましょうか。
